room_title: Escape room "The Elevator" by Michigan Escape Room in Detroit
review: My husband and I have been to four different escape rooms and they were great. The Elevator room here was one of our favorite rooms! Difficult, challenging, and great for teamwork. We had 7 people and it was the perfect amount. Thanks to Mitch who was a great host! He was so great explaining things to our team and talked with us afterwards about the experience.

room_title: Escape room "The Elevator" by Michigan Escape Room in Detroit
review: Our group did the Elevator to end a day of three escape rooms in the area. The motion element was awesome, but this room was extremely challenging! Getting the pieces to the final puzzle and getting out was very rewarding!

room_title: Escape room "The Elevator" by Michigan Escape Room in Detroit
review: My group has done over 75 rooms and this location is one of the best! The Elevator scenario is my favorite room out of all the ones I've done!

room_title: Escape room "The Elevator" by Michigan Escape Room in Detroit
review: Had an awesome time last night doing the Elevator room! So much fun! Canâ€™t wait to come back and do another room!

room_title: Escape room "The Elevator" by Michigan Escape Room in Detroit
review: The Elevator is a must. Really immersive. Kidnapped is super cool if you love more of a horror movie vibe in your escape rooms. Naughty List is fun for families with kids. Loved it!
